title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Workshop on Engineering Project-Based Program Outcome Evaluation Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Concepts in Engineering Project Management and Evaluation, Foundational Knowledge of the ADDIE Model
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: An engineering project evaluation process can be designed according to the ADDIE model phases.
Evaluation criteria can be developed using a mapping table between projects and program outcomes (PO).
Learner-specific achievement levels can be analyzed by applying rubric-based micro-assessment methodologies.
Project evaluation data can be collected and visualized using digital tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
